review: I am an Amazon Video Library user - and have all of my movies purchased and stored on their (my) cloud. I have tried using my TIVO box, a PS3, a Google TV and a computer hooked to my TV to retrieve and show movies - but nothing worked 100% until I found this. It is TERRIFIC.I could ask that they allow additional apps to be installed - but I am a satisfied customer!!!

review: I bought this product because I am a truck driver and I needed a device that would stream my movies,tv fav or music on to itself and then I would be able to watch it on my tv and not use up my internet data but I was disappointed to find that this device is just another box like direct tv or cox cable. I already have netflix,amazon,hulu at home on my vizio tv so I don't need this device there. So this is a waste of money cause it is costing more money on my internet data connection.Don't by it unless you have umlimited data.

review: I have used Dish Net broadband service with no issues for many months, using the midrange service, up to 10Mbps.  No problems.Within a day or two of installing the Fire TV, I had consumed half of my months allotment, without to my knowledge downloading more than short segments of a couple of Movies, which, by the way had downloaded erratically.I did not find evidence from Amazon prior to making the purchase that Satellite broadband is not suited to more than occasional short segments of movies, tv, etc.This is the first time I have been dissatisfied with a large number of purchases from Amazon.

review: I have used it everyday for about 2.5 weeks now, and I have to say I am completely sold.  I do find it strange that there is no power button (it turns itself off) and it is really nice that when hitting the home button the device turns my TV to the correct input selection automatically.  I wish it had HBOGo now (its supposed to be added in the next few months) and sometimes searching is a little wonky.Although I have not used the amazon instant too much, the voice command option is great.  Easily recognizes words and names quickly.  I would recommend anyone thinking of getting a box like this to purchase this one.  I was set to get the Apple TV, but this device is so much more powerful that my decision was made for me.
